website_summaries.verdict: This face wash aims to balance dry and oily T-spot areas with a delicious mix of mint, bergamot, lavender, and geranium essential oils.
pros: The cleanser has a thick texture and it only takes a dot of product to get a silky, foamy wash
It doesn’t dry out the skin while stripping out oil, and leaves it feeling refreshed
cons: Those with very dry skin did not feel enough of a moisturizing effect

customer_reviews.title: Great product, not so great packaging/safety measures
customer_reviews.text: So I love this facewash. Star reductions are for packaging and lack of a sealed container. Came in Saran Wrap and tossed in a box with other items which is fine but I’d prefer for the product to arrive in its official brand packaging and sealed. when I removed the wrap I was able to squeeze out the product past the initial hardened crusty part in the opening. Lol sounds gross. I can just hope that it contains the orginal, untampered cleansing formula but next time I’ll just go to the store to ease the doubt.
customer_reviews.author: DaniZepp

customer_reviews.title: Misleading product info
customer_reviews.text: This is not the full size 5oz bottle. I ordered it and received a 1.7oz product and had to send it back. Better to order on Macy's directly and save some money and get the right product.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: love love love it
customer_reviews.text: I have very oily skin which also happens to be sensitive, and this facewash makes my skin creak (in a good, clean way) without doing any damage or causing irritation. Have used it for over a year now, and I swear by it.
customer_reviews.author: Polina Komissarova

customer_reviews.title: Best face wash
customer_reviews.text: I love this face wash. I have combination dry skin and I found that other “gentle” washes didn’t really clean my skin. Checks and Balances is super frothy with the smallest amount used... my skin always feels fresh but not tight, and the smell is light but clean. Worth the price because I only buy like 3 or 4 a year... (it seriously lasts forever).
customer_reviews.author: Julia

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely obsessed with this face wash! It has a very frothy and tingly feeling that leaves your skin feeling so clean. This is my second time buying it now. I also have sensitive skin and have struggled with finding just a good every day face wash. This did the trick for me!
customer_reviews.author: Jennica

customer_reviews.title: Best face wash ever!
customer_reviews.text: Just used it for the first time. Bought it solely based on internet search and amazon reviews. My skin has never felt this good after a wash. I mean even better than post facial or a spa day. I don’t remember not needing a moisturizer soon after washing my face until I used this product. I will of course continue to use a moisturizer but this face wash didnt make my face dry or tight after use. Can’t wait to wash my face again with it.
customer_reviews.author: Kaavya Chivukula

customer_reviews.title: The best face wash I have ever used.
customer_reviews.text: I love this product! It lathers well and my face feels clean and not greasy after. But even if I forget to lotion on after I don't feel like my face is dry.
customer_reviews.author: Shauna

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: A little goes a long way. I have dry skin and this is perfect for my face. Cleans brightens and smooths.
customer_reviews.author: Laura Galante

customer_reviews.title: Great if you have sensitive, oily, or oily to normal skin
customer_reviews.text: Origins Checks and Balances Frothy Face Wash is great at getting all your makeup off without stripping your skin!
customer_reviews.author: VJ Girl

customer_reviews.title: Great product great brand
customer_reviews.text: I have been using Origins for 20 years now. This face wash is one of my must haves. Nice scent and lathers really good. Gets my face clean and I don’t have pimples.
customer_reviews.author: Bella Winner

customer_reviews.title: Exactly Like The Sephora Store-bought Sample
customer_reviews.text: This product is a full size and is exactly like the store bought sample I tried from Sephora. The soap is creamy and doesn’t dry out my skin but leaves it feeling clean and smooth.
customer_reviews.author: M. Menelas

customer_reviews.title: Great facial cleanser that won’t dry out your skin.
customer_reviews.text: Origins is a great product. I bought this for a face wash that wouldn’t dry out my skin, but also help with breakouts. It worked wonders for me. Leaves my face soft and smooth. I saw results within a week of using.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: No seal. Gross.
customer_reviews.text: I used this product from a sample and loved it. Ordered it from this seller and uuhhh spent like 5 minutes trying to get the lid off assuming it would be sealed... it wasn’t. VERY disappointed and almost don’t wanna use it. Yikes. It’s the small things that count!! Next time I’ll spend more money for a product I know hasn’t been tampered with! ;)
customer_reviews.author: Callie Ullery

customer_reviews.title: Smiling
customer_reviews.text: Best face wash,never dries out. Leaves skin clean and soft.
customer_reviews.author: B. Williams

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Love this. Pricy but a little is all it takes
customer_reviews.author: kelly napper

customer_reviews.title: Best face wash!
customer_reviews.text: My favorite face wash! Been using 10+ years and haven’t found better.
customer_reviews.author: Steve and Jaclyn

customer_reviews.title: Squeaky Clean
customer_reviews.text: The best face wash I have used. I love the frothy foam. It makes my face so squeaky clean.
customer_reviews.author: monkeyemonk

customer_reviews.title: excellent
customer_reviews.text: does not dry out skin. I have used this product since 2010
customer_reviews.author: Ha26

customer_reviews.title: Favorite Face wash!
customer_reviews.text: Favorite face wash by far. I keep coming back to it. It lasts a while too because you really don’t have to use that much.
customer_reviews.author: Krista Barnes

customer_reviews.title: Go to wash
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this product for years. Love it
customer_reviews.author: Amy S.

customer_reviews.title: Cleans your face perfectly
customer_reviews.text: Removes all dirt and oil. A must for a fresh, clean face !
customer_reviews.author: Tony Koziol

customer_reviews.title: The best face wash EVER
customer_reviews.text: The best face wash EVER! I have used this for years and my face always feels so fresh and clean afterwards.
customer_reviews.author: Rebekah

customer_reviews.title: Must purchase face wash!
customer_reviews.text: BEST face wash I’ve used in a really long time. I have combination skin, and my face feels so smooth and clean after rinsing. It also doesn’t strip away moisture, like a lot of cleaners will do. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda koch

customer_reviews.title: Great Cleanser
customer_reviews.text: Loved the fact that this cleanser foams well and leaves the skin soft and smooth. Will definitely buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Carol A. Bronte

customer_reviews.title: Love this been using for 2 years
customer_reviews.text: i love the consistency and how it foams up. cleans without over drying.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THIS!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this product! It has really cleared up my skin.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Frothy and fantastic
customer_reviews.text: So fantastic! Clean and fabulous. I use my electronic brush with it and love it.
customer_reviews.author: Greta

customer_reviews.title: Fake product
customer_reviews.text: Don’t buy this product! It is not the actual origins checks and balances face wash I love. It gave me a chemical burn that has lasted weeks.
customer_reviews.author: Gwen Bradlee

customer_reviews.title: How it feels
customer_reviews.text: I received my order immediately. I love origins products. My facial skin feels wonderful when I use this cleanser
customer_reviews.author: ROSEY

customer_reviews.title: Frothy face wash
customer_reviews.text: Very good for my skin type. Just a little goes quite far. I am satisfied with the size.
customer_reviews.author: CMO

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: It’s easy to use, it’s clean and the face is not tight.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Hart Vendt

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for sensitive dry skin! Smells great and you don’t need a lot.
customer_reviews.author: Nikki

customer_reviews.title: I love this
customer_reviews.text: Love how an extremely small amount cleans your entire face.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Custome

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Face wash for the price
customer_reviews.text: I wear a lot of makeup and this thick, foamy face wash does a great job for the price. I can get away without double cleansing by washing a few more times with using cloth towelettes. I’ve read reviews about this product aggravating acne but I’ve had no problems. Great light mint smell. I have my second purchase on the way.
customer_reviews.author: Miss DTP

customer_reviews.title: Best cleanser
customer_reviews.text: I've used this for about a year and it's totally worth it. I have sensitive, oily skin that usually doesn't respond well to frothy cleansers. I tried a drugstore brand for a week and my skin felt like rough paper. After 5 days of using this, my skin feels soft and I have zero breakouts. It's pricey, but a little bit goes a long way. My previous bottle lasted about a year, it's well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: ART

customer_reviews.title: "Go to" cleanser
customer_reviews.text: I have had this cleanser before, I don't have severe acne, but I get pimples and I have severely dry skin. This is the only cleanser (that I keep returning to because I venture out and regret it) that seems to keep my skin in check (get it?). Love the natural side to it. Froths up really nicely and removes all makeup. I enjoy the scent
customer_reviews.author: Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Best face wash EVER!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve used this frothy face wash for 16 years now. It truly is a godsend. It leaves your skin nourished and leaves you with a fresh, finished appearance. If you only use one product on your face, this needs to be it. It cleans dry to oily skin perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Dried my skin out...
customer_reviews.text: Not like the product I received directly from origins. This dried out my face and was terrible. I don’t know why I it would be so different.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Farwell

customer_reviews.title: New favorite face wash
customer_reviews.text: This is my new favorite face wash. It’s nice a foamy, smells great, and seems quite gentle. You only need a tiny bit, so this will last a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Alex H.

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the money.
customer_reviews.text: Only product that doesn’t cause me to break out on my face. I have been using this for years.
customer_reviews.author: av8tor

customer_reviews.title: As expected
customer_reviews.text: I have used this product for some time. Usually buy from Sephora but bought on here this time and it was as expected!
customer_reviews.author: Kristina

customer_reviews.title: Great face wash!
customer_reviews.text: I love this face wash. It makes your face feel so clean and only takes a tiny bit to get a wonderful lather.
customer_reviews.author: Denise

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I wanted!
customer_reviews.text: Great product, have very sensitive skin and this works great!
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie J Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Clean soft skin
customer_reviews.text: This face wash is the best I have used to date. It Makes your skin incredibly soft and does not dry it. My skin is sensitive but this has worked wonders and I have had no breakouts since i started using it. I would highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: favorite face wash
customer_reviews.text: I cant live without this,...have been using Origins for years,...best product for dry sensitive skin
customer_reviews.author: Doreen Martin

customer_reviews.title: Great face wash
customer_reviews.text: Gentle and cleans makeup off face so easily. Great for my sensitive skin.
customer_reviews.author: Soxford

customer_reviews.title: Product lasts longer than it looks
customer_reviews.text: I tried the 1oz size before ordering this 5oz one. I like how you just need a tiny bit to wash your face, so even the 1oz size lasts a while. My face feels really clean. I like the light mint fragrance.
customer_reviews.author: Lena J

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Love this product and use it every day. Now I can get it quickly without leaving the house.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love this stuff! I have such sensitive skin and this works amazing!
customer_reviews.author: SGen

customer_reviews.title: Foams really well
customer_reviews.text: A little goes a long way and it rinses off well.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Basic cleanser that doesn't dry out my skin.
customer_reviews.text: Great basic cleanser. Used it in my 30s and now in my 50s. Still works!
customer_reviews.author: practice humility

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this stuff! It’s light and fresh and the scent isn’t overwhelming. Has definitely helped with acne as well!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Duppler

customer_reviews.title: Sending testers.
customer_reviews.text: Product came with liquid oozing out, looked like it was already used and they mailed the tester. Not impressed and very frustrated.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Origins Check and Balances Facial Wash
feature_bullets: Origins Checks And Balances Frothy Face Wash FULL SIZE 5 OZ
